languages.text: Any stat tests increase in difficulty by Arbitrator's Coercion/10 (does not stack).

traits.locale_text: Any stat tests increase in difficulty by Arbitrator's Coercion/10 (does not stack).

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistance tests{/g} have a −<u>(Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} / 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. Does not stack.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Проверки на сопротивление{/g} проходят со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Напор{/g} арбитра / 10)</u> . Не суммируется.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Direnç testleri{/g}, −<u>(Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g} yeteneği / 10)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahiptir. Etki üst üste birikmez.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Direnç testleri{/g}, −<u>(Yargıcı'nın {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Gözdağı{/g} yeteneği / 10)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahiptir. Etki üst üste birikmez.

languages.text: Se aplica una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g} del Arbitrator / 10)</u> a las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistance tests{/g} have a −<u>(Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} / 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: Se aplica una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −<u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coacción{/g} del Arbitrator / 10)</u> a las {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}pruebas de fortaleza{/g}. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 敌方目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，会额外承受-<u>（法务官的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}/10）</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此效果不可叠加。
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Resistance tests{/g} have a −<u>(Arbitrator's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Coercion{/g} / 10)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g}. Does not stack.

traits.locale_text: 敌方目标进行{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}时，会额外承受-<u>（法务官的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}胁迫{/g}/10）</u>{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。此效果不可叠加。

languages.text: Les {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}tests de résistance{/g} ont une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} égale à <u>({g|Encyclopedia:SkillCoercion}Intimidation{/g} de l'arbitrator / 10)</u>. Non cumulable.
